items.content_html: Chrona-Graph is a lightweight, TypeScript-based framework for building graph-based workflows and AI agents. Inspired by LangGraph, but with a focus on simplicity, speed, and ease of use.
items.title: philmetzger/chrona-graph: Chrona-Graph is a lightweight, TypeScript-based framework for building graph-based workflows and AI agents. Inspired by LangGraph, but with a focus on simplicity, speed, and ease of use.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: NetMirror Chatbot - Interactive Streaming Assistant The NetMirror Chatbot is a lightweight, JavaScript-based chatbot designed to assist users in finding the best streaming options. It provides instant recommendations and guides users to stream popular movies and shows. Easily integrate it into any website to enhance user engagement.
items.title: omarjamil27/netmirrorapps-chatbot: NetMirror Chatbot - Interactive Streaming Assistant The NetMirror Chatbot is a lightweight, JavaScript-based chatbot designed to assist users in finding the best streaming options. It provides instant recommendations and guides users to stream popular movies and shows. Easily integrate it into any website to enhance user engagement.

items.content_html: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.
